rules_text:
Whenever Warrior of the Setting Sun becomes tapped, discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. For each nonland card discarded this way, create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token.
Relentless [i](When this creature dies, if it doesn't have haste, return it to the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of your next end step.)[/i]
